landingSubtitle: Suraksha Setu is a real-time platform that links volunteers with those in need during emergencies, providing critical information and support when it matters most.
reportIncidentDesc: Quickly report emergencies like floods or power outages with location details and photos.
findSafetyDesc: Use our live map to find the nearest safe zones, shelters, and hospitals in real-time.
getHelpDesc: Request immediate assistance and connect with registered volunteers ready to help.
noInternetDesc: Stay connected and get help even without an internet connection. Use our dedicated WhatsApp and SMS channels to report incidents or request assistance.
whatsappDesc: Send 'HELP' to our automated WhatsApp number to start a report.
smsDesc: Text 'HELP' to our shortcode for immediate assistance.
signInContinue: Sign in to continue to SafeHaven.
